front.title: RTP Payload Format for Multi-Flow FEC

abstract.t: This document defines a new RTP payload format for the Forward ErrorCorrection (FEC) that is used to protect multiple source flows. Theformat defined by this document enables the protection of multiplemedia sources encapsulated in RTP with one or more repair flows andis based on the FEC framework (described in [I-D.ietf-fecframe-framework]) and the SDP Elements for FEC Framework (described in[I-D.ietf-fecframe-sdp-elements]).
